data.question: What is the main application of the two MOFs, NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD, discussed in the research?
data.answer: The main application is for one-step separation of ethane/ethylene (C2H6/C2H4) under humid conditions to produce polymer-grade pure C2H4.

data.question: What makes NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD suitable for gas separation under humid conditions?
data.answer: Their good water stability and hydrophobic pore environments make them capable of efficiently separating C2H6/C2H4 under humid conditions.

data.question: True or False: NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD have open metal sites (OMSs) which benefit the separation in humid conditions.
data.answer: False

data.question: What is the significance of the pore size in NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD for their application in gas separation?
data.answer: The moderate pore size (0.8 nm) is beneficial to obtain high C2H6 adsorption capacity and C2H4 productivity.

data.question: How were the affinity sites and static adsorption energies of NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD revealed?
data.answer: The affinity sites and their static adsorption energies were successfully revealed by single crystal data and computation studies.

data.question: True or False: The C2H6 uptake of NKMOF-14-PZ at 298 K is the highest among all reported C2H6-selective MOFs.
data.answer: False

data.question: What is the role of the trinuclear Fe building blocks in the design of NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD?
data.answer: Trinuclear Fe building blocks are chosen to construct MOFs with high stability.

data.question: True or False: NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD demonstrated faster kinetic adsorption for C2H4 than C2H6.
data.answer: False

data.question: What was the outcome of the breakthrough experiments for NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD?
data.answer: The breakthrough experiments verified that NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD could efficiently separate C2H6/C2H4, yielding polymer-grade C2H4.

data.question: True or False: NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD possess high water vapor sorption ability, which benefits their separation performance.
data.answer: False

data.question: How do NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD maintain their structural integrity under various conditions?
data.answer: They retained their crystallinity after being exposed to various harsh conditions, including boiling water, acidic/basic solutions, and high temperatures.

data.question: True or False: The BET surface areas of NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD are below 1000 m2 g-1.
data.answer: False

data.question: What is the significance of the hydrophobic angles measured for NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD?
data.answer: The hydrophobic angles indicate their hydrophobicity, which is beneficial for gas separation under humid conditions.

data.question: True or False: NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD can be recycled for at least five cycles without any degradation of separation efficiency.
data.answer: True

data.question: What makes NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD stand out among other C2H6-selective MOFs for separation under humid conditions?
data.answer: Their comprehensive separation performance, including high C2H6 uptake and selectivity under humid conditions, makes them superior.

data.question: True or False: The separation performance of NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD decreases significantly under humid conditions.
data.answer: False

data.question: What is the role of the (3,9)-connected xmz topology in the design of NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD?
data.answer: The (3,9)-connected xmz topology contributes to their high porosity and structural robustness, which are essential for gas separation.

data.question: True or False: The C2H6/C2H4 separation performance of NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD is unaffected by the presence of water vapor.
data.answer: True

data.question: How do NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD achieve preferential adsorption of ethane?
data.answer: By designing MOFs without open metal sites and with trinuclear Fe clusters coordinating with N-donor ligands, they achieve preferential adsorption of ethane.

data.question: True or False: The gas adsorption sites in NKMOF-14-PZ and NKMOF-14-PD were only predicted by computational studies.
data.answer: False
